metadata.title: Wafaqi Mohtasib to inaugurate new buildings in Multan &Bahawlpur

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 24 (APP):The Wafaqi Mohtasib, Mr. Ejaz Ahmad Qureshi, will inaugurate the new office building of the Wafaqi Mohtasib Regional Office, Multan, on Thursday, 26 June 2025. He will hold a meeting with the officers of the Wafaqi Mohtasib, Multan, Bahawalpur, and DG Khan Regional Offices, besides conferring with the representatives of the Federal agencies there. These meetings will be held to streamline professional matters, particularly those aimed at providing prompt relief to the public by redressing maladministration in the public sector organizations. He would urge them to redouble their efforts in this regard.
